Identification.LongTitle: Order Respecting the Remission of Customs Duties on Billiard Cloth for the Manufacture or Repair of Billiard Tables

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to section 101 of the Customs Tariff*, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Order respecting the remission of customs duties on billiard cloth for the manufacture or repair of billiard tables.

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Billiard Cloth Remission Order, 1996.

Subject to section 3, remission is hereby granted of the customs duties paid or payable under Schedule I to the Customs Tariff on billiard cloth, of tariff item Nos. 5111.19.00 or 5112.19.10, for the manufacture or repair of billiard tables.
The remission is granted pursuant to section 2 on the condition that:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the billiard cloth is imported into Canada during the period commencing on July 1, 1995 and ending on December 31, 1997; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a claim for remission is made to the Minister of National Revenue within three years of the date of importation of the goods for which remission is claimed.
